title: Xiang Huo Er Sheng
synopsis:
It mainly tells the moving story of Han Yan, the head of Feiliu Fire Station, and a group of young people including Jiang Mingsheng, Ning Wei, and Fan Haoyuan, who burn their youth and blood and fight on the front line of firefighting. Not only are there high-energy moments of fire rescue, but also the fire brigade that is extremely brave in wartime and extremely cute in leisure time, as well as fascinating suspense cases and hard-core firefighting knowledge! Show a different kind of passionate youth.

(Source: Iqiyi, Google translated)
